title: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: The checkboxes in the table take a long time (about 30 seconds) to update their checked state. A busy cursor should be shown during this process.
OB: When updating the checked state of the checkboxes in the table, it takes a long time (about 30 seconds) for the changes to be applied. Currently, no visual indication is given to the user that the system is busy.
EB: When updating the checked state of the checkboxes in the table, a busy cursor should be shown to indicate that the system is processing the changes. The changes should be applied in a reasonable amount of time, preferably within a few seconds.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to the page with the table of checkboxes. 
2. Check or uncheck one or more checkboxes. 
3. Observe that it takes a long time (about 30 seconds) for the changes to be applied. 
4. No busy cursor is shown during this process.
